channel.title: vBulletin4 or SMF 2.0 rc
channel.description:
Hi, my friend has set me up a vBulletin4 but i myself find it difficult to Admin
Which forum do you recoment?
[ul][li]vBulletin4[/li] [li]SMF 2.0 rc[/li][/ul]
I have made SMF forums before and they are much simpler than vB, but are they as good, what is better?? what should i chosoe?

item.title: vBulletin4 or SMF 2.0 rc
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Im going with SMF, purely because its easier.

Read full topic

item.title: vBulletin4 or SMF 2.0 rc
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Its your choice.

Read full topic

item.title: vBulletin4 or SMF 2.0 rc
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

MyBB is pretty good aswell.

Read full topic

item.title: vBulletin4 or SMF 2.0 rc
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:2, topic:331150”]Vb is the best bought forum software, but its also more complex to use. On the other hand SMF is probably the best free forum software out there, and it is much simpler.

I would say if your going for a professional look then Vb is it, but if your just going for just a regular type forum then SMF would be the better choice.[/quote]

So where does this put me? they are suitable for my needs. They are both equally good, the only thing that is different is features…

Read full topic

item.title: vBulletin4 or SMF 2.0 rc
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Vb is the best bought forum software, but its also more complex to use. On the other hand SMF is probably the best free forum software out there, and it is much simpler.

I would say if your going for a professional look then Vb is it, but if your just going for just a regular type forum then SMF would be the better choice.

Read full topic
